guideContainer.name: guide1
guideContainer.thankYouMessage: Thank you for submitting the form.

guideradiobutton.jcr:title: Are you an international students?
guideradiobutton.longDescription: You are an international student if you're not an Australian citizen or an Australian permanent resident, and you're not a New Zealand citizen.
guideradiobutton.name: isInternational

guidedropdownlist.jcr:title: Will you be bringing ONE family member or friend?
guidedropdownlist.name: guests

guidetextdraw_1808649233._value:
Please note

Grant recipients must check in at the Equity and AccessAbility Services stand (ATC Building, Level 2) or at GS Building level 2 upon arrival at Open Day. Grants will be paid via a cheque made out to the student named in this form, and will be sent after attendance at Open Day is confirmed. Please email equity@swinburne.edu.au if you have any questions.

By completing this form, you are agreeing to receive further communications from Swinburne about potential courses of study, news, events and activities.
guidetextdraw_1808649233.name: textdraw_18086492331539646822374
